verses.verse: Then <S%G3767><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> covenant had <S%G2192><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> ordinances <S%G1345><s%> of divine <S%G2999><s%> service, <S%G2999><s%> and a worldly <S%G2886><s%> sanctuary. <S%G39><s%>

For there was a tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> made; <S%G2680><s%> the first, <S%G4413><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> was the candlestick, <S%G3087><s%> and the table, <S%G5132><s%> and the show bread; <S%G4286><s%> <S%G740><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> the sanctuary. <S%G39><s%>
And after <S%G3326><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> veil, <S%G2665><s%> the tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> the Holiest <S%G39><s%> of all;

Which had <S%G2192><s%> the golden <S%G5552><s%> censer, <S%G2369><s%> and the ark <S%G2787><s%> of the covenant <S%G1242><s%> overlaid <S%G4028><s%> round <S%G3840><s%> about <S%G3840><s%> with gold, <S%G5553><s%> wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> was the golden <S%G5552><s%> pot <S%G4713><s%> that had <S%G2192><s%> manna, <S%G3131><s%> and Aaron's <S%G2><s%> rod <S%G4464><s%> that budded, <S%G985><s%> and the tables <S%G4109><s%> of the covenant; <S%G1242><s%>

And over <S%G5231><s%> it the cherubim <S%G5502><s%> of glory <S%G1391><s%> shadowing <S%G2683><s%> the mercy seat; <S%G2435><s%> of which <S%G3739><s%> we cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> speak <S%G3004><s%> particularly. <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3313><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when these <S%G5130><s%> things were thus <S%G3779><s%> ordained, <S%G2680><s%> the priests <S%G2409><s%> went <S%G1524><s%> always <S%G1275><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> tabernacle, <S%G4633><s%> accomplishing <S%G2005><s%> the service <S%G2999><s%> of God.

But into <S%G1519><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> went the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> alone <S%G3441><s%> once <S%G530><s%> every year, <S%G1763><s%> not without <S%G5565><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> he offered <S%G4374><s%> for himself, <S%G1438><s%> and for the errors <S%G51><s%> of the people: <S%G2992><s%>

The Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> signifying, <S%G1213><s%> that the way <S%G3598><s%> into the holiest <S%G39><s%> of all was not yet <S%G2089><s%> made <S%G5319><s%> manifest, <S%G5319><s%> while as the first <S%G4413><s%> tabernacle <S%G4633><s%> was yet <S%G2089><s%> standing: <S%G2192><s%>

Which <S%G3748><s%> was a figure <S%G3850><s%> for the time <S%G2540><s%> then <S%G3588><s%> present, <S%G1764><s%> in which <S%G3739><s%> were offered both <S%G5037><s%> gifts <S%G1435><s%> and sacrifices, <S%G2378><s%> that could <S%G1410><s%> not make <S%G5055><s%> him that did <S%G3000><s%> the service <S%G3000><s%> perfect, <S%G5048><s%> as pertaining to the conscience; <S%G4893><s%>

Which stood only <S%G3440><s%> in meats <S%G1033><s%> and drinks, <S%G4188><s%> and divers <S%G1313><s%> washings, <S%G909><s%> and carnal <S%G4561><s%> ordinances, <S%G1345><s%> imposed <S%G1945><s%> on them until <S%G3360><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> of reformation. <S%G1357><s%>

But Christ <S%G5547><s%> being come <S%G3854><s%> an high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> of good <S%G18><s%> things to come, <S%G3195><s%> by a greater <S%G3187><s%> and more perfect <S%G5046><s%> tabernacle, <S%G4633><s%> not made <S%G5499><s%> with hands, <S%G5499><s%> that is to say, not of this <S%G5026><s%> building; <S%G2937><s%>

Neither <S%G3761><s%> by the blood <S%G129><s%> of goats <S%G5131><s%> and calves, <S%G3448><s%> but by his own <S%G2398><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> he entered <S%G1525><s%> in once <S%G2178><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the holy <S%G39><s%> place, having obtained <S%G2147><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> redemption <S%G3085><s%> for us.

For if <S%G1487><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of bulls <S%G5022><s%> and of goats, <S%G5131><s%> and the ashes <S%G4700><s%> of an heifer <S%G1151><s%> sprinkling <S%G4472><s%> the unclean, <S%G2840><s%> sanctifies <S%G37><s%> to the purifying <S%G2514><s%> of the flesh: <S%G4561><s%>

How <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> shall the blood <S%G129><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the eternal <S%G166><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> offered <S%G4374><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> without <S%G299><s%> spot <S%G299><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> purge <S%G2511><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> from dead <S%G3498><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> to serve <S%G3000><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> God? <S%G2316><s%>

And for this <S%G5124><s%> cause <S%G1223><s%> he is the mediator <S%G3316><s%> of the new <S%G2537><s%> testament, <S%G1242><s%> that by means <S%G1096><s%> of death, <S%G2288><s%> for the redemption <S%G629><s%> of the transgressions <S%G3847><s%> that were under <S%G1909><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> testament, <S%G1242><s%> they which are called <S%G2564><s%> might receive <S%G2983><s%> the promise <S%G1860><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> inheritance. <S%G2817><s%>
For where <S%G3699><s%> a testament <S%G1242><s%> is, there must also of necessity <S%G318><s%> be the death <S%G2288><s%> of the testator. <S%G1303><s%>

For a testament <S%G1242><s%> is of force <S%G949><s%> after men are dead: <S%G3498><s%> otherwise <S%G1893><s%> it is of no <S%G3361><s%> strength <S%G2480><s%> at <S%G3379><s%> all <S%G4219><s%> while <S%G3753><s%> the testator <S%G1303><s%> lives. <S%G2198><s%>
Whereupon <S%G3606><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> the first <S%G4413><s%> testament was dedicated <S%G1457><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> blood. <S%G129><s%>

For when Moses <S%G3475><s%> had spoken <S%G2980><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> precept <S%G1785><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the law, <S%G3551><s%> he took <S%G2983><s%> the blood <S%G129><s%> of calves <S%G3448><s%> and of goats, <S%G5131><s%> with water, <S%G5204><s%> and scarlet <S%G2847><s%> wool, <S%G2053><s%> and hyssop, <S%G5301><s%> and sprinkled <S%G4473><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the people, <S%G2992><s%>
Saying, <S%G3004><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> is the blood <S%G129><s%> of the testament <S%G1242><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has enjoined <S%G1781><s%> to you.

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> he sprinkled <S%G4473><s%> with blood <S%G129><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> the tabernacle, <S%G4633><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> the vessels <S%G4632><s%> of the ministry. <S%G3009><s%>

And almost <S%G4975><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things are by the law <S%G3551><s%> purged <S%G2511><s%> with blood; <S%G129><s%> and without <S%G5565><s%> shedding <S%G130><s%> of blood <S%G130><s%> is no <S%G3756><s%> remission. <S%G859><s%>

It was therefore <S%G3767><s%> necessary <S%G318><s%> that the patterns <S%G5262><s%> of things in the heavens <S%G3772><s%> should be purified <S%G2511><s%> with these; <S%G5125><s%> but the heavenly <S%G2032><s%> things themselves <S%G846><s%> with better <S%G2909><s%> sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> these. <S%G5025><s%>

For Christ <S%G5547><s%> is not entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the holy <S%G39><s%> places made <S%G5499><s%> with hands, <S%G5499><s%> which are the figures <S%G499><s%> of the true; <S%G228><s%> but into <S%G1519><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> itself, <S%G846><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> to appear <S%G1718><s%> in the presence <S%G4383><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> for us:

Nor <S%G3761><s%> yet that he should offer <S%G4374><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> often, <S%G4178><s%> as the high <S%G749><s%> priest <S%G749><s%> enters <S%G1535><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the holy <S%G39><s%> place every <S%G2596><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> with blood <S%G129><s%> of others; <S%G245><s%>

For then must <S%G1163><s%> he often <S%G4178><s%> have suffered <S%G3958><s%> since <S%G575><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world: <S%G2889><s%> but now <S%G3568><s%> once <S%G530><s%> in the end <S%G4930><s%> of the world <S%G165><s%> has he appeared <S%G5319><s%> to put <S%G115><s%> away <S%G115><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> by the sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> of himself. <S%G848><s%>
And as it is appointed <S%G606><s%> to men <S%G444><s%> once <S%G530><s%> to die, <S%G599><s%> but after <S%G3326><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> the judgment: <S%G2920><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> was once <S%G530><s%> offered <S%G4374><s%> to bear <S%G399><s%> the sins <S%G266><s%> of many; <S%G4183><s%> and to them that look <S%G553><s%> for him shall he appear <S%G3700><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> time without <S%G5565><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> to salvation. <S%G4991><s%>
